summary: Most requested UI/theme updates appear implemented (pink theme tokens, YouTube-like header strip with faux search/actions, creme gloss-animated heading, banner rendered). However, the required new banner image asset itself is not shown as added, and the footer-specific non-white text requirement cannot be fully verified from the truncated App.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new static banner image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated named excited-mom-thumbs-up-banner.dim_1600x400.png and use it as a full-width top banner without broken links.
missing_requirements.reason: The app references the required image path, but the diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence the required static asset actually exists in the repository under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the footer includes the texts "moms_of_ momland.inc" and the joke copyright notes, and those specific texts are not white.
missing_requirements.reason: Global CSS defines a non-white footer text color token, but the footer content itself (including the exact required strings) is not visible in the truncated App.tsx diff, so it cannot be confirmed that those specific footer texts exist and are styled as required.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (truncated before footer; footer strings not shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/used an additional generated image asset reference for a "goofy mascot character" (/assets/generated/goofy-mascot.dim_768x768.png).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only required adding/using the excited mom thumbs-up banner image; no mascot image was requested.
